H0.text: What term is used for leaves which have several colours. Polychrome

H1.text: What term is used for leaves which have several colours. Multicolor

H2.text: What term is used for leaves which have several colours. Heterochromatic

H3.text: What term is used for leaves which have several colours. Variegate

A4.text: Polychrome is the 'practice of decorating architectural elements, sculpture, etc., in a variety of colors.'
